data.message: Hey, man! Check this, it’s pretty awesome!

article.title: The Fallout 4 Pip-Boy Edition Is Back In Stock Now
article.subtitle: Kotaku
article.excerpt: The Fallout 4 Pip-Boy edition is back in stock at Gamestop, for all 3 platforms. Additionally, Walmart also has it in stock for the PS4 and Xbox One as of this writing, as does Best Buy.
